channel.title: [BUG] Unable to progress through the tutorial
channel.description:
#### What happened? I entered the tutorial slideshow and was unable to progress past the second slide, nor able to back up to the previous slide
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I should've been able to access the next slide
#### Steps to reproduce: 1) Press the tutorial button on main menu 2) Press next 3) You should find you can't access the next slide or go back to the previous slide
#### Comments: None

item.title: [BUG] Unable to progress through the tutorial
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
The bug should now be fixed.

Read full topic

item.title: [BUG] Unable to progress through the tutorial
item.dc:creator: TheButterMage
item.description:
What happened?

I entered the tutorial slideshow and was unable to progress past the second slide, nor able to back up to the previous slide

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

I should’ve been able to access the next slide

Steps to reproduce:

  1. Press the tutorial button on main menu
  2. Press next
  3. You should find you can’t access the next slide or go back to the previous slide

Comments:

None
